featured.text: After the first snow of the year, the entire grassland disappeared under a _____ of snow.

definition.zh_def: 草原是一種以草類植物為主的生態系統，通常位於氣候乾燥的地區。
definition.en_def: Grassland is an ecosystem dominated by grasses, typically found in areas with dry climates.
definition.example: The herd of buffalo grazed peacefully across the vast grassland.
